title: The Tender power
creator_contributor_role: United States Information Agency, production company
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Women - Employment - United States
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women - Economic conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women - Social conditions

description: Portrays the lives of three typical American women as they participate in the world of work, and the resultant benefits to themselves, their families and the nation's economy. All have families and are quite active outside the traditiional role of the housewife.
